title: Farming World MULTI6-ALiAS
description:
Decided to upload something I got off of another site, given that it's not here as of yet.



Whether you specialize in grain, fruits or even maintaining your own dairy farm, in Farming World you have the ultimate choice on how you shape your business. With dozens of seed types to choose from and an extensive stock market listing, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to adapt to become profitable. With plenty of seeds growing at different seasons, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll need to stock up so you can sell when produce is most in demand.

As you continue to increase your profits though, that small patch of land you started with is not going to cut it. In this PC farming simulator  game, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll need to expand your farmÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s reaches across the map. Land can be purchased if youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re wealthy enough but for those with a limited budget you might be better off renting the it until you can afford to own your entire farm. As you obtain more fields to work in, youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to construct roads which allow your vehicles to navigate to the correct patch of land so they can harvest and maintain the fields.

In order to maintain your farm youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll need to construct a selection of buildings from a selection of over 40 to including; greenhouses, bakeries and butcheries . YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll also be able to purchase animals from the traditional chickens and cows to the more unconventional domestic turkeys and ostriches.

Features of ExcaliburÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Farming World:

    Develop road networks for your vehicles to use
    Purchase and rent land
